title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument: Education
body: Following in his Footsteps; Park Education Programs "My sentiments are perfectly in unison with yours sir, that the best means of forming a manly, virtuous and happy people, will be found in the right education of youth. Without this foundation, every other means, in my opinion, must fail." -George Washington letter to George Chapman December 15, 1784                 Curriculum Materials For information and mateirals on programs offered by the park. Read More        Plan a Field Trip Information on how to plan your field trip and answers to some frequent questions Read More
